article: under pressure from the regional governor , hundreds of armed pakistani tribesmen on tuesday started a hunt for al-qaida suspects believed to be hiding in remote territories near the afghanistan border , a tribal elder said .
abstract: armed tribesmen pledge to hunt down al-qaida suspects in remote pakistani region
